page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content: AGE 2-5:DRESSING UP IN CLOTHES OR JUST HATS IS VERY POPULAR ALL YEAR ROUND.DURING THE SUMMER PLAYING IN A PADDLING POOL BECOMES THE MOST POPULAR GAME.PLAYING WITH DOLLS,ACTION MEN AND LEGO IS ALWAYS ENJOYED. AGE 5-11:CHASING GAMES-THE CHILDREN ALL RUN FROM SOMEONE WHO IS 'ON'.THE PERSON WHO IS ON MUST TOUCH SOMEBODY WHO THEN TES OVER BEING 'ON'. SWINGING GAMES WHERE THE CHILDREN SWING EACH OTHER AROUND.THE FASTER YOU CAN GO,THE BETTER. FOLLOW MY LEADER. SKIPPING GAMES. AGE 11-15:MANY OF THE ABOVE GAMES ARE STILL POPULAR UNTIL ABOUT 14 YEARS OLD. FOOTBALL AND CATCHING GAMES THEN TAKE OVER.FROM ABOUT 13 UPWARDS MANY CHILDREN PREFER TO SIT AND TALK.
